leave_policy: Employees are entitled to 12 casual and 12 sick leaves per year. Unused leaves do not carry forward.
holiday_list: 2026 holidays: Republic Day (26 Jan), Holi (9 Mar), Independence Day (15 Aug), Diwali (8 Nov).
work_hours: Our office hours are 9 AM to 6 PM, Monday to Friday.
benefits: Employees receive health insurance, provident fund (PF), and an annual bonus.
leave_apply: To apply for leave, mention type (casual/sick) and date range, e.g., 'Apply sick leave from Feb 5 to Feb 7'.
